Headline: 12 Roosevelt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt,Ashland ,15th,Loomis,and Roosevelt due to,street blockage near Roosevelt/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #12 Roosevelt  buses are temporarily rerouted via  Roosevelt,Ashland ,15th,Loomis and Roosevelt , due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier polkice activity at Granville. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier polkice activity at Granville.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
